original_text: So built we the wall; and all the wall was joined together unto the half thereof: for the people had a mind to work.
korean_text: 이에 우리가 성을 건축하여 전부가 연결되고 높이가 절반에 이르렀으니 이는 백성이 마음 들여 일을 하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: and all the wall was joined together
for the people had a mind to work
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 백성들이 일할 마음이 있었기 때문이라
